original_text: And there we saw the giants, the sons of Anak, which come of the giants: and we were in our own sight as grasshoppers, and so we were in their sight.
korean_text: 거기서 네피림 후손인 아낙 자손의 거인들을 보았나니 우리는 스스로 보기에도 메뚜기 같으니 그들이 보기에도 그와 같았을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And there we saw the giants
and we were in our own sight as grasshoppers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 우리 눈에는 메뚜기 같았습니다

sentences.original_text: and so we were in their sight
